other_tests.findings: Vacuolization of the basal layer, epidermal spongiosis, and many neutrophils. The changes were interpreted as exfoliative dermatitis, possibly toxic epidermal necrolysis or Stevensâ€“Johnson syndrome.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The pustules gradually resolved and cleared within 14 days after discontinuing hydroxychloroquine.

other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm, normal rate, with atrial premature complexes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Nonspecific T-wave abnormalities were noted, but otherwise normal.
